name: Tornado Trouble
description:
The game is based around a guy who rotates around several computers in order to deploy shields to protect cities from tornadoes.

The left side of the screen shows the player and the computers, and the right side shows the cities and the tornadoes.

See the "How-to" section in the main menu for more instructions.

Difficulty
The game has three difficulty settings, but we did not have much time to tweak the difficulties so you might not agree with what levels are the most difficult.

Thank you for checking out our game!
